datasets.name: 2007 EPA Toxics Release Inventory
datasets.description: The Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) is a publicly available EPA database that contains information on toxic chemical releases and waste management activities reported annually by certain industries as well as federal facilities. Sourced from http://www.epa.gov/tri/tridata/tri07/.
